code: export var api="http://localhost:5000/api";export var uploads="http://localhost:5000/uploads";export var requestConfig=function requestConfig(method,data){var token=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:null;var image=arguments.length>3&&arguments[3]!==undefined?arguments[3]:null;var config;if(image){config={method:method,body:data,headers:{}};}else if(method==="DELETE"||data===null){config={method:method,headers:{}};}else{config={method:method,body:JSON.stringify(data),headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}};}if(token){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;};
